text: Atanas Andreev (, born 15 January 1960) is a Bulgarian rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Bulgaria Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Sofia
title: Atanas Andreev
